column1: In the second stage: - The surgeon removes the tissue expander from your chest and replaces it with a breast implant.
Getting breast implants does not take as long as breast reconstruction that uses your own tissue.
- A scar may form around the implant in your breast.
These include aspirin, ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin), vitamin E, clopidogrel (Plavix), warfarin (Coumadin), and others.
